attributes.action: give free medicine syringes for Children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want your help in getting free prescribed syringes for children who need to take liquid medicines.
Pharmacists are only paid to provide syringes when liquid doses are not multiples of 5mls.
But we know that syringes are needed to give medicines because 
•Accuracy – exact measure easy to give 
•Sterile where immunity is compromised 
•Flexible – they can be made up as exact dosages and sent to school with the child for example 
 •Syringes are what a child is used to while in hospital 
•Medicines can be given in more concentrated solutions, so allowing child more stomach room for food! 
Lack of free syringes seriously undermines the ability of parents to provide the best care. 
Most children with long term conditions receive their treatment at home.  HeartLine Association has been aware for some time that families suffer much inconvenience and expense when administering drugs to children of all ages.
We have found that oral syringes are the most efficient and least emotionally damaging way of doing this.
